name: Silverback DeFi — Top Coins
description: Top cryptocurrencies ranked by market cap with price data
paramHints: chain (default: base). Returns top tokens by market cap — no token-specific filtering.

name: Silverback DeFi — Whale Moves
description: Monitor whale buys, sells, and transfers for any token

name: Silverback DeFi — Token Audit
description: Token security audit: honeypot detection, tax analysis, ownership risks

name: Silverback DeFi — Technical Analysis
description: RSI, MACD, Bollinger Bands technical analysis for tokens

name: Silverback DeFi — Trending Tokens
description: Trending tokens and pools by volume and activity on a specific chain
paramHints: chain (default: base). Returns trending tokens — no token-specific filtering.

name: Silverback DeFi — Top Pools
description: Top yielding pools on Base DEXes
paramHints: chain (default: base). Returns top pools — no token-specific filtering.

name: Silverback DeFi — DEX Metrics
description: Base DEX ecosystem: volume, TVL, gas stats, top pairs
paramHints: chain (default: base). Returns overall DEX metrics — no token-specific filtering.

name: Silverback DeFi — DeFi Yield
description: DeFi yield opportunities on Base
paramHints: chain (default: base). Returns top yield opportunities — no token-specific filtering.

name: Gloria AI — News
description: Latest 10 crypto news headlines by category (ai, base, bitcoin, crypto, defi, ethereum, macro, solana)

name: Gloria AI — Recaps
description: 12-24 hour news recap and sentiment summary by category

name: Gloria AI — Ticker Summary
description: 24-hour token activity summary with key events and price context

name: Neynar — Cast Search
description: Search Farcaster casts by keyword for social sentiment and community discussion

name: Neynar — User Search
description: Search Farcaster users and profiles for community analysis

name: Neynar — Feed
description: Fetch a specific Farcaster user's feed by FID. Requires a known Farcaster user ID — not for general search
paramHints: fid (required: Farcaster user ID number). Only use if you know a specific user's FID.

name: Neynar — Channel Search
description: Search Farcaster channels for community and topic analysis

name: Elsa x402 — Search Token
description: Search for token by name or symbol across multiple chains. Use first to resolve token addresses for other Elsa endpoints.
paramHints: symbol_or_address (required: token symbol like 'AERO' or 0x address)

name: Elsa x402 — Token Price
description: Get token price with best-price discovery across 20+ DEX protocols. Requires chain and token_address.

name: Elsa x402 — Analyze Wallet
description: Deep wallet analysis: holdings, PnL, risk scoring, diversification

name: Elsa x402 — Yield Suggestions
description: AI-powered yield farming recommendations based on risk profile
paramHints: wallet_address (required: 0x wallet address), chain (optional: 'base', 'ethereum', etc.), risk_level (optional: 'low', 'medium', 'high')

name: Elsa x402 — Gas Prices
description: Current gas prices across supported networks
paramHints: chain (optional: 'base', 'ethereum', etc.). No other params needed.

name: Elsa x402 — Portfolio
description: Multi-chain portfolio overview with balances and positions across 15+ chains

name: Firecrawl — Web Search
description: Search the web and get LLM-ready markdown content. Use for breaking news, governance proposals, or data not covered by other endpoints

name: Einstein AI — Latest Pairs
description: Latest deployed tokens on-chain with liquidity pool data. Deep Bitquery intelligence

name: Einstein AI — Smart Money Leaderboard
description: Top trader wallets with buy/sell flow analysis and accumulation patterns. Deep Bitquery intelligence
